data.title: Tania Wursig Art, Original Paintings and Fine Art Prints
data.meta_description: Tania Wursig is a figurative artist based in Sydney and Tahiti. Her work is predominantly a celebration of life, culture and authentic traditions, expressing a strong connection to the land. Her paintings are imbued with strong cultural influences inspired by her exposure to the Tahitian people and their islands.
data.text:
*Prices are in Australian Dollars

Acrylic and collaged charcoal and chalk pastel drawings on paper on canvas

102 x 61cm

This is the first in a series of new works exploring the kaleidoscope of womanhood -past, present, and future. "HERSTORY" is an assemblage of past life drawing studies, creating the foundational history of the portrait. These drawings subtly emerge through the skin, symbolising the many versions of ourselves that we carry with us, along with the strength and wisdom of the women who came before us.

This technique serves as a delicate reminder of the complexities of womanhood, reflecting the stages of our feminine journey. At times fierce and at others vulnerable, this piece stands as a metaphor for the inner feminine experience.

*As this is a ready to hang canvas, shipping will be calculated separately, or you can arrange to collect from the SYDNEY STUDIO
